item.title: Hypothes.is
item.description: Hypothes.is: A Tool for Collaborative Reading & Annotation The first thing I want you to do is to set up an account with the Hypothes.is tool. While watching this video, turn on the closed captions. Create an account at hypothes.is: Get the Chrome app or the Firefox bookmarklet: Make sure you’re logged in: Then join our HIST1900a reading group. If you happen to be reading something, and see an existing annotation that interests you, hit the ‘reply’ button on the annotation to start a conversation!

item.title: Week 1 Getting Set Up
item.description: Goals Listen Read Do Reflect Report Back Goals for this week Our overarching goal starting up is to set up your digital archaeology workflow, and to map out some of the broad contours of ‘digital archaeology’.
